Name: Pineapple Margarita
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime juice and Tajín seasoning rim. Float a dehydrated pineapple slice wheel or adorn with a pineapple wedge on rim..
Review: As advertised, a Margarita with pineapple fruitiness. If you have it, a splash of pineapple syrup helps balance while amplifying the pineapple flavour.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Margarita contains 166 calories
